channel.title: join my group
channel.description: i created a group so it would be easier to find people to play with anyway its public and it should be fun. its only the start but once it get big enough itll be REAL FUN anyway join now [url]https://steamcommunity.com/groups/blackmesasourceclan[/url]

item.title: join my group
item.dc:creator: fury
item.description:
Sounds interessting but i have not seen any competition in BM so far… I hope the BM gameplay will be adjusted to make the game more competitive (more teamplay focussed maps, more balanced weapons, more advanced movement, good and working voting-system… etc.) in future… I also hope there will be some leagues then. Might also join your group… Because… Why not. If somebody here has a HL1 or BM clan who wants to compete, feel free to add me in steam (find me in the steamgroup) and we can play a fun clan match.

Read full topic
